text: Xianzhi [mu sheng] a! Dang nu xinshi lai xiang ni fashi: Tamen jue bu gei an la shezhi renhe pei wu, bu toudao, bu jianyin, bu shahai ziji de ernu, bu feibang, bu niezao huangyan [ru bu ba feifa suo huai zhizi shuo cheng shi zhangfu zhizi], buzai yisilan jiaoyi jiaogui shang weibei ni, name, ni dang jieshou tamen de shiyan, dang qiu an la kuanshu tamen. An la que shi zui kuanshu de, te ci de.
